actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to provide that certain air traffic specialists be considered as air traffic controllers for retirement and certain other purposes.

summary.text: Includes within the definition of "air traffic controller" for purposes of statutes pertaining to Federal employee pay, retirement, and employment, persons actively engaged in providing preflight, inflight, or airport advisory service to aircraft operators and the immediate supervisors of such persons.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to provide that certain air traffic specialists be considered as air traffic controllers for retirement and certain other purposes.
